General.Name: Zhejiang Songyuan Automotive Safety
General.Description: Zhejiang Songyuan Automotive Safety Systems Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, production, sale, and service of auto parts and accessories in China and internationally. It's product portfolio includes automotive passive safety system products, such as seat belt assemblies, airbags, steering wheels, and special seat safety devices. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Yuyao, China.
